entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
